data.title: Another World
data.meta_description: Another World is a song by One Direction. It was released as a b-side to their second single, "Gotta Be You". It was released on November 11, 2011. Â  "Another World" was written by Achraf Jannusi, Bilal Hajji, Eric Sanicola, Geo Slam, Nadir Khayat and Teddy Sky. It was produced by Nadir Khayat.

I'm just tryna' read the signals I'm receiving

Just like a stone on fire, can you feel it?
